thread.title: Visiting Brits perplexed, relieved over brief U.S. shutdown

title: Visiting Brits perplexed, relieved over brief U.S. shutdown
text:
Visiting Brits perplexed, relieved over brief U.S. shutdown Friday, February 09, 2018 - 00:53 
A group of British politics students visiting Washington, D.C., expressed a sigh of relief Friday after a brief government shutdown overnight ended before the start of business, allowing them to visit the city's museums as planned. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).
